main event: An object was observed in Essex Junction, VT, on 19 Oct 55, changing shape from a half-moon to a disk.
interesting points: The object was first dull orange and then changed to blue-white,The observation lasted 3Â½ minutes,The shape changed continuously while dimming in size,The object was noted while driving towards home,It attracted attention due to its lack of discernible motion.
sighted object: one object shaped like a half moon
witness description: male, age 30, electronics technician, National Guard, with prior military service in the Navy
